mechanics.trigger: When Arcane Sword appears (on spell cast)
mechanics.condition: You choose a target within 5 feet of the sword
mechanics.outcome: You make a melee spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 3d10 force damage.

mechanics.trigger: Each of your turns, while Arcane Sword spell persists
mechanics.outcome: You move the sword up to 20 feet to a spot you can see. You choose a target within 5 feet of the sword. You make a melee spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 3d10 force damage.
A sword-shaped plane of force hovers within range. It lasts for the duration.

description_text: You create a sword-shaped plane of force that hovers within range. It lasts for the duration. When the sword appears, you make a melee spell attack against a target of your choice within 5 feet of the sword. On a hit, the target takes 3d10 force damage. Until the spell ends, you can use a bonus action on each of your turns to move the sword up to 20 feet to a spot you can see and repeat this attack against the same target or a different one.
